function.name: static_analyzer
function.description: Performs static analysis on a CUDA kernel source file. Analyzes kernel structure, indexing patterns, memory access patterns, and potential performance issues like warp divergence.

file_path.description: Path to the CUDA .cu source file to analyze

function.name: profiler
function.description: Profiles a CUDA kernel to measure runtime performance metrics including execution time, variance, and statistics. Requires a compiled kernel binary.

kernel_info.description: Dictionary containing kernel information with 'compiled_file' or 'kernel_file' and 'kernel_name'

compiled_file.description: Path to the compiled kernel library (.so or .dll)

kernel_file.description: Path to the source CUDA file

function_name.description: Name of the function to profile (e.g., 'test_saxpy')
